text: Honestly, you’re the most clueless person I’ve ever met.
That’s pretty harsh. What did I do?
You forgot our meeting again. You never take anything seriously.
I’m sorry. My alarm didn’t go off—I'll make it up to you.
Yeah right. You’re such a lazy, irresponsible jerk.
I get it’s frustrating, but you don’t have to tear me down like that.
